author: oheger
msg: Added support for setting a Synchronizer to BasicBuilderParameters.

author: oheger
msg: The Synchronizer object is now exclusively used to protect an instance against
concurrent access. This is a change of behavior because previously there was
always some kind of synchronization; now this is configurable. Therefore,
currently some tests for multi-threaded access are failing and have been

author: rmuir
msg: add a variant of testThreadInterruptDeadlock that uses 2 threads

author: oheger
msg: Ensure proper synchronization of BaseHierarchicalConfiguration.subset() method.

author: oheger
msg: Don't call non-private, non-final methods from the constructor.
